医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人类神经元模型确定了阿尔茨海默病的潜在治疗靶点威尔康奈尔医学院的科学家们开发了一种创新的人类神经元模型，该模型可以可靠地模拟 tau 蛋白聚集体在大脑中的扩散，这一过程会导致阿尔茨海默病和额颞叶痴呆患者的认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Human-neuron-model-identizes-pottial-therapeutic-targets-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Human-neuron-model-identizes-potential-therapeutic-targets-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3faaf153-d077-4110-8a8c-608473e8576e Fri, 05 Apr 2024 15:59:49 -0400 Human neuron model identifies potential therapeutic targets for Alzheimer's disease
研究发现，新型联合疗法在难治性子宫内膜癌中显示出希望在丹娜—法伯癌症研究所研究人员发起的一项小型 2 期研究中，抗体药物偶联物和免疫检查点抑制剂的新型组合在接受过治疗的难治性子宫内膜癌患者中显示出显着的活性癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Novel-combination-therapy-shows-promise-in-difficult-to-treat-endometrial-cancer-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Novel-combination-therapy-shows-promise-in-difficult-to-treat-endometrial-cancer-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67eb910d-20dd-4e92-aeb9-63b513d153ae Fri, 05 Apr 2024 15:54:04 -0400 Novel combination therapy shows promise in difficult-to-treat endometrial cancer, study finds
研究显示，终生压力暴露会影响美国黑人的心血管反应密歇根大学的一项新研究表明，每天和终生暴露在压力下可能会导致美国黑人的压力反应磨损，从而削弱他们的生物压力反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Lifetime-stress-exposure-impacts-cardioangio-reactivity-in-Black-Americans-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Lifetime-stress-exposure-impacts-cardioangio-reactivity-in-Black-Americans-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e62a0be-8199-45a2-b203-d9f05cb50a12 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 15:30:50 -0400 Lifetime stress exposure impacts cardiovascular reactivity in Black Americans, study shows
加州大学圣地亚哥分校的研究人员发现饮酒与遗传有关以加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院为中心的研究小组深入研究了由直接面向消费者的遗传学公司 23andMe, Inc. 编制的超过 300 万人的数据集，发现了影响饮酒的遗传因素之间的有趣联系。以及它们与其他疾病的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/UC-San-Diego-researchers-discover-genic-connections-to-alcohol-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/UC-San-Diego-researchers-discover-genic-connections-to-alcohol-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2f631c7-d8a0-467c-8ace-d84753c6f0e4 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 15:09:05 -0400 UC San Diego researchers discover genetic connections to alcohol consumption
麻省总医院开发用于 MPOX 诊断的临床决策支持工具诊断传染性疾病可能具有挑战性。对于临床经验有限的罕见和新出现的传染病，诊断尤其具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Mass-General-Hospital-develops-clinical-decision-support-tool-for-mpox-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Mass-General-Hospital-develops-clinical-decision-support-tool-for-mpox-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4fc281d-eab7-4cc5-9e78-3469a691154b Fri, 05 Apr 2024 15:02:12 -0400 Mass General Hospital develops clinical decision support tool for mpox diagnosis
研究人员获得 190 万美元资助开发用于失血检测的可穿戴设备国防部向阿肯色大学和阿肯色大学医学科学大学的多学科研究团队拨款略高于 190 万美元，用于开发一种可穿戴设备，帮助早期检测和监测内出血和外出血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Researchers-awarded-2419-million-to-develop-wearable-device-for-blood-loss-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Researchers-awarded-2419-million-to-develop-wearable-device-for-blood-loss-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4197d637-6c03-4231-bf31-f4db739aad07 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 14:53:11 -0400 Researchers awarded $1.9 million to develop wearable device for blood loss detection
怀孕期间蛋白质摄入量影响后代的面部特征怀孕期间饮食中的蛋白质含量会影响后代的面容。这在动物研究中得到了证明，并且在人类遗传学研究中也发现了潜在的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Protein-intake-during-pregnancy-affects-offsprings-facial-features.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Protein-intake-during-pregnancy-affects-offsprings-facial-features.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2a65845-f91d-40d7-8eba-4775de96a0a8 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 14:49:00 -0400 Protein intake during pregnancy affects offspring's facial features
研究人员开发用于快速细菌检测的手持设备听到大肠杆菌或沙门氏菌这两个词，我们就会想到食物中毒。快速检测此类细菌对于预防食源性疾病的爆发至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Researchers-develop-handheld-device-for-rapid-bacterial-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Researchers-develop-handheld-device-for-rapid-bacterial-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=691b8104-c5b2-4990-9fab-f7590b5d6c6e Fri, 05 Apr 2024 14:17:00 -0400 Researchers develop handheld device for rapid bacterial detection
英国政府向乌克兰捐赠价值200万英镑的医疗设备英国政府已向乌克兰捐赠了价值超过 200 万英镑的救生医疗设备，包括呼吸机、泵和监护仪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/UK-Government-donates-c2a32-million-worth-of-medical-equipment-to-Ukraine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/UK-Government-donates-c2a32-million-worth-of-medical-equipment-to-Ukraine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1751bac8-53e8-49cb-8327-b94c6980c0cf Fri, 05 Apr 2024 13:55:18 -0400 UK Government donates £2 million worth of medical equipment to Ukraine
2024 年世界卫生日：通过 AZoNetwork 倡导全民健康权利2024 年世界卫生日。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/World-Health-Day-2024-Championing-Uni​​versal-Health-Rights-with-AZoNetwork.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/World-Health-Day-2024-Championing-Uni​​versal-Health-Rights-with-AZoNetwork.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13f4ce0b-c75d-4a33-8da1-13120c679c8b Fri, 05 Apr 2024 09:38:00 -0400
